meanings.definition: Make (something) greater by adding to it; increase.
meanings.sent1: She augments her income by taking on extra shifts at work.
meanings.sent2: The chef augments the flavor of the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent3: His collection of stamps augments daily, much to his delight.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is like a magical potion that augments the joy in our hearts.
meanings.sent5: The sun's warm embrace augments the beauty of the blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: A thing that is added or added to.
meanings.sent1: The new painting was a beautiful augment to the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: Each new chapter in the book serves as an augment to the storyline.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gift was a delightful augment to her birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude is an augment that brightens the team's spirit.
meanings.sent5: The extra toppings on the pizza were a delicious augment to the flavors.
